trans-unit.source: You must enter less than 140 characters.
trans-unit.target: You must enter less than 140 characters.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete this item? The action cannot be undone.
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to delete this item? The action cannot be undone.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to report this user as a spammer?
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to report this user as a spammer?

trans-unit.source: The user has been reported as a spammer and blocked.
trans-unit.target: The user has been reported as a spammer and blocked.

trans-unit.note: Tweets by me that other people retweeted.
Retweets by people that I'm following.

trans-unit.source: Web accessibility for the Twitter website application
trans-unit.target: Web accessibility for the Twitter website application

trans-unit.source: Easy Chirp is a web-accessible alternative to the Twitter.com website. It is designed to be simple to use and is optimized for people who are disabled. It also works with keyboard-only, older browsers like IE7, lowband internet connection, and without JavaScript. Learn more about web accessibility.
trans-unit.target: Easy Chirp is a web-accessible alternative to the Twitter.com website. It is designed to be simple to use and is optimized for people who are disabled. It also works with keyboard-only, older browsers like IE7, lowband internet connection, and without JavaScript. Learn more about web accessibility.

trans-unit.source: Refer to the development tasks further down this page for items currently in progress. Learn more about Easy Chirp on the About and Features pages. You may also read an extensive list of user feedback and blogs/articles about this application.
trans-unit.target: Refer to the development tasks further down this page for items currently in progress. Learn more about Easy Chirp on the About and Features pages. You may also read an extensive list of user feedback and blogs/articles about this application.

trans-unit.source: Donate with PayPal; credit cards accepted.
trans-unit.target: Donate with PayPal; credit cards accepted.

trans-unit.source: View more on the Articles & Feedback page.
trans-unit.target: View more on the Articles & Feedback page.

trans-unit.source: A built-in shorten URL tool with choice of service.
trans-unit.target: A built-in shorten URL tool with choice of service.

trans-unit.source: Search, user search, and saved searches.
trans-unit.target: Search, user search, and saved searches.

trans-unit.source: View, subscribe, and create Twitter Lists.
trans-unit.target: View, subscribe, and create Twitter Lists.

trans-unit.source: Works great with or without JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: Works great with or without JavaScript.

trans-unit.source: Inline threading of tweets; displays reply "conversation".
trans-unit.target: Inline threading of tweets; displays reply "conversation".

trans-unit.source: In addition to old and new desktop browsers, I work on virtually any user-agent (even Lynx, a text-only browser), with screen readers and Braille displays, and tablets and mobile devices.
trans-unit.target: In addition to old and new desktop browsers, I work on virtually any user-agent (even Lynx, a text-only browser), with screen readers and Braille displays, and tablets and mobile devices.

trans-unit.source: Recipient of the American Foundation for the Blind (AFB) 2011 Access Award.
trans-unit.target: Recipient of the American Foundation for the Blind (AFB) 2011 Access Award.

trans-unit.source: Recipient of the 2009 Access IT @web2.0 Award.
trans-unit.target: Recipient of the 2009 Access IT @web2.0 Award.

trans-unit.source: <abbr title="Royal National Institute of Blind People">RNIB</abbr> Website of the Month, December 2011.
trans-unit.target: <abbr title="Royal National Institute of Blind People">RNIB</abbr> Website of the Month, December 2011.

trans-unit.source: Read more about Easy Chirp's awards on the About page.
trans-unit.target: Read more about Easy Chirp's awards on the About page.

trans-unit.source: The user to whom you're messaging must be following you.
trans-unit.target: The user to whom you're messaging must be following you.

trans-unit.source: You can also send a Direct Message thru the regular status update box with the command: d + username + message
trans-unit.target: You can also send a Direct Message thru the regular status update box with the command: d + username + message

trans-unit.source: You are not followed by anyone.
trans-unit.target: You are not followed by anyone.

trans-unit.source: Note: You may subscribe to a list from the Lists page of a specific user.
trans-unit.target: Note: You may subscribe to a list from the Lists page of a specific user.

trans-unit.source: (required, under 25 characters, letters and numbers only)
trans-unit.target: (required, under 25 characters, letters and numbers only)

trans-unit.source: You are the owner of this list.
trans-unit.target: You are the owner of this list.

trans-unit.source: (No alternative text is offered from Twitter.)
trans-unit.target: (No alternative text is offered from Twitter.)

trans-unit.source: Must be a valid GIF, JPG, or PNG image of less than 700 kilobytes in size.
trans-unit.target: Must be a valid GIF, JPG, or PNG image of less than 700 kilobytes in size.

trans-unit.source: You can report a spammer account to Twitter three ways:
trans-unit.target: You can report a spammer account to Twitter three ways:

trans-unit.source: Click the Report Spammer icon link under the user options in a tweet.
trans-unit.target: Click the Report Spammer icon link under the user options in a tweet.

trans-unit.source: Click the Report Spammer icon link on the user details page.
trans-unit.target: Click the Report Spammer icon link on the user details page.

trans-unit.source: Send a direct message to the Twitter account "spam" followed by the user's account name. Follow this syntax: d spam @username. For example: d spam @fake is a spammer!
trans-unit.target: Send a direct message to the Twitter account "spam" followed by the user's account name. Follow this syntax: d spam @username. For example: d spam @fake is a spammer!

trans-unit.source: Tips for searching are listed on the Search page.
trans-unit.target: Tips for searching are listed on the Search page.

trans-unit.source: The following table provides tips on how to use the Twitter text commands relating to friends, favorites and direct messages.
trans-unit.target: The following table provides tips on how to use the Twitter text commands relating to friends, favorites and direct messages.

trans-unit.source: Directs a tweet at named person, and causes your twitter to save in their "replies" timeline. Only you, named person, and users following both, will see this tweet in their timeline.
trans-unit.target: Directs a tweet at named person, and causes your twitter to save in their "replies" timeline. Only you, named person, and users following both, will see this tweet in their timeline.

trans-unit.source: @caratina I love that song too, The Cure rules!
trans-unit.target: @caratina I love that song too, The Cure rules!

trans-unit.source: Same as above but allows all accounts to view the tweet. (Period at beginning.)
trans-unit.target: Same as above but allows all accounts to view the tweet. (Period at beginning.)

trans-unit.source: .@jennison I love that song too, Joy Division rules!
trans-unit.target: .@jennison I love that song too, Joy Division rules!

trans-unit.source: Retweet. When you copy and pass along someone else's message. This is the old method which is different that Twitter's "native" retweet.
trans-unit.target: Retweet. When you copy and pass along someone else's message. This is the old method which is different that Twitter's "native" retweet.

trans-unit.source: RT @easychirp Working on some performance enhancements with the API.
trans-unit.target: RT @easychirp Working on some performance enhancements with the API.

trans-unit.source: Modified tweet. Similar to a Retweet, but when you modify someone else's message.
trans-unit.target: Modified tweet. Similar to a Retweet, but when you modify someone else's message.

trans-unit.source: Cool! MT @EasyChirp is working on some performance enhancements with the Twitter API. #twitter #a11y
trans-unit.target: Cool! MT @EasyChirp is working on some performance enhancements with the Twitter API. #twitter #a11y

trans-unit.source: For accounts with more than one author, the author adds a carat (^) and his initials to the end of the tweet to clarify who he is.
trans-unit.target: For accounts with more than one author, the author adds a carat (^) and his initials to the end of the tweet to clarify who he is.

trans-unit.source: @somebody Yes, sent to email address associated with the account. ^DW
trans-unit.target: @somebody Yes, sent to email address associated with the account. ^DW

trans-unit.source: Sends a person a direct (private) message.
trans-unit.target: Sends a person a direct (private) message.

trans-unit.source: d dennisl Want to meet at Starbucks at 4pm today?
trans-unit.target: d dennisl Want to meet at Starbucks at 4pm today?

trans-unit.source: Easy Chirp is mentioned in The Twitter Book, now in the second edition! See the first page of the Get Started section. Follow co-author Sarah Milstein @SarahM.
trans-unit.target: Easy Chirp is mentioned in The Twitter Book, now in the second edition! See the first page of the Get Started section. Follow co-author Sarah Milstein @SarahM.

trans-unit.source: Accessible Twitter is mentioned in Näin käytät Twitteriä (How to Use Twitter). A book written in Finnish by author Maija Haavisto (@DiamonDie).
trans-unit.target: Accessible Twitter is mentioned in Näin käytät Twitteriä (How to Use Twitter). A book written in Finnish by author Maija Haavisto (@DiamonDie).

trans-unit.source: All links and functionality is keyboard accessible.
trans-unit.target: All links and functionality is keyboard accessible.

trans-unit.source: Simple, consistent layout and navigation is provided.
trans-unit.target: Simple, consistent layout and navigation is provided.

trans-unit.source: Headings and page titles are implemented carefully for optimal accessibility.
trans-unit.target: Headings and page titles are implemented carefully for optimal accessibility.

trans-unit.source: Ajax actions are concluded with an alert (JS or ARIA) that notifies the user of the result of the action.
trans-unit.target: Ajax actions are concluded with an alert (JS or ARIA) that notifies the user of the result of the action.

trans-unit.source: Large default text size and high high color contrast.
trans-unit.target: Large default text size and high high color contrast.

trans-unit.source: Text may be resized many levels without breaking layout.
trans-unit.target: Text may be resized many levels without breaking layout.

trans-unit.source: Access keys (native keyboard shortcuts) to main menu items.
trans-unit.target: Access keys (native keyboard shortcuts) to main menu items.

trans-unit.source: Forms and data tables are marked up for optimal accessibility.
trans-unit.target: Forms and data tables are marked up for optimal accessibility.

trans-unit.source: Code is semantic, light, and adheres to best practices for Web Standards.
trans-unit.target: Code is semantic, light, and adheres to best practices for Web Standards.

trans-unit.source: ARIA is implemented throughout including document landmark roles, alert roles, and live region for the dynamic character counter.
trans-unit.target: ARIA is implemented throughout including document landmark roles, alert roles, and live region for the dynamic character counter.

trans-unit.source: A "skip to main content" link is provided for keyboard users (and a "skip to sign in" link on the home page).
trans-unit.target: A "skip to main content" link is provided for keyboard users (and a "skip to sign in" link on the home page).

trans-unit.source: Works with all types of assistive technology including screen readers, screen enlargers, braille-output, text-only browsers, and pretty much any web-enabled device.
trans-unit.target: Works with all types of assistive technology including screen readers, screen enlargers, braille-output, text-only browsers, and pretty much any web-enabled device.

trans-unit.source: When writing a tweet, a character counter and a Shorten URL feature (choose bit.ly or weba.im) are available.
trans-unit.target: When writing a tweet, a character counter and a Shorten URL feature (choose bit.ly or weba.im) are available.

trans-unit.source: In addition to the basic retweet, quote tweet, and reply, user can reply to all and email tweet.
trans-unit.target: In addition to the basic retweet, quote tweet, and reply, user can reply to all and email tweet.

trans-unit.source: View, subscribe, and create Twitter Lists.
trans-unit.target: View, subscribe, and create Twitter Lists.

trans-unit.source: Search tweets and users (and search tips).
trans-unit.target: Search tweets and users (and search tips).

trans-unit.source: Add, delete, and run saved searches.
trans-unit.target: Add, delete, and run saved searches.

trans-unit.source: Edit basic profile settings including updating avatar.
trans-unit.target: Edit basic profile settings including updating avatar.

trans-unit.source: Easily jump to user's profile and timeline.
trans-unit.target: Easily jump to user's profile and timeline.

trans-unit.source: Inline threading of tweets; displays reply "conversation".
trans-unit.target: Inline threading of tweets; displays reply "conversation".

trans-unit.source: Tweets contain linked hash tags and usernames.
trans-unit.target: Tweets contain linked hash tags and usernames.

trans-unit.source: Easy to review a tweet when replying and quoting.
trans-unit.target: Easy to review a tweet when replying and quoting.

trans-unit.source: View details of who you're following and your followers.
trans-unit.target: View details of who you're following and your followers.

trans-unit.source: Number of retweets are displayed on each tweet (if 1 or more).
trans-unit.target: Number of retweets are displayed on each tweet (if 1 or more).

trans-unit.source: View Retweets by you, of you, and to you.
trans-unit.target: View Retweets by you, of you, and to you.

trans-unit.source: Quickly find out if a user is following you from the user's profile page.
trans-unit.target: Quickly find out if a user is following you from the user's profile page.

trans-unit.source: A link to Twitter is provided for 'View Single Tweet' page and for owned and subscribed lists.
trans-unit.target: A link to Twitter is provided for 'View Single Tweet' page and for owned and subscribed lists.

trans-unit.source: Designed for all screen resolutions, great for desktop, tablet and mobile.
trans-unit.target: Designed for all screen resolutions, great for desktop, tablet and mobile.

trans-unit.source: Works on all major browsers: IE7, IE8, IE9, Firefox, Safari, Opera, and Chrome.
trans-unit.target: Works on all major browsers: IE7, IE8, IE9, Firefox, Safari, Opera, and Chrome.

trans-unit.source: A "2" was added to the Easy Chirp name in mid-2013 after a full relaunch (and rewrite). The relaunch was due to major updates needed including a change in the Twitter API. A successful Kickstarter campaign was run in order to help funding for the relaunch.
trans-unit.target: A "2" was added to the Easy Chirp name in mid-2013 after a full relaunch (and rewrite). The relaunch was due to major updates needed including a change in the Twitter API. A successful Kickstarter campaign was run in order to help funding for the relaunch.

trans-unit.source: Originally, the app was named "Accessible Twitter". Many of the articles and awards cited on this website use this name. Learn more about the name change.
trans-unit.target: Originally, the app was named "Accessible Twitter". Many of the articles and awards cited on this website use this name. Learn more about the name change.

trans-unit.source: Help keep Twitter fully web-accessible by donating to Easy Chirp! All donations will go toward site development, maintenance, and hosting fees.
trans-unit.target: Help keep Twitter fully web-accessible by donating to Easy Chirp! All donations will go toward site development, maintenance, and hosting fees.

trans-unit.source: Donate with PayPal; credit cards accepted.
trans-unit.target: Donate with PayPal; credit cards accepted.

trans-unit.source: Feedback and suggestions are always welcome. In addition to Twitter, you may contact Easy Chirp by emailing info AT easy chirp dot com.
trans-unit.target: Feedback and suggestions are always welcome. In addition to Twitter, you may contact Easy Chirp by emailing info AT easy chirp dot com.

trans-unit.source: Show your support for web accessibility by promoting Easy Chirp! Or just because you like it (smiley). Here are some ideas on how:
trans-unit.target: Show your support for web accessibility by promoting Easy Chirp! Or just because you like it (smiley). Here are some ideas on how:

trans-unit.source: Mention us on Facebook or Google Plus.
trans-unit.target: Mention us on Facebook or Google Plus.

trans-unit.source: Easy Chirp 2 is built with PHP (with Codeigniter MVC framework), HTML5, JavaScript (and jQuery), and the Twitter API.
trans-unit.target: Easy Chirp 2 is built with PHP (with Codeigniter MVC framework), HTML5, JavaScript (and jQuery), and the Twitter API.

trans-unit.source: This site is not affiliated in any way to Twitter.
trans-unit.target: This site is not affiliated in any way to Twitter.

trans-unit.source: Your information is safe with us! The information in your profile, tweets, etc., will not used in any way outside of this web application. Use of this web site is voluntary. This site is not responsible for any data which may be changed or lost.
trans-unit.target: Your information is safe with us! The information in your profile, tweets, etc., will not used in any way outside of this web application. Use of this web site is voluntary. This site is not responsible for any data which may be changed or lost.

trans-unit.source: Recipient of the AFB 2011 Access Award
trans-unit.target: Recipient of the AFB 2011 Access Award

trans-unit.source: Accessible Twitter was honored with the American Foundation for the Blind 2011 Access Award. Other recipients included CBS, Lexmark, and Walt Disney Parks & Resorts.
trans-unit.target: Accessible Twitter was honored with the American Foundation for the Blind 2011 Access Award. Other recipients included CBS, Lexmark, and Walt Disney Parks & Resorts.

trans-unit.source: Recipient of the 2009 Access IT @web2.0 Award
trans-unit.target: Recipient of the 2009 Access IT @web2.0 Award

trans-unit.source: The Access IT @web2.0 Award is in recognition of a project, product or service that advances accessibility on web 2.0. Endorsed by the International Webmasters Association (IWA). The selection process assesses the relevance for the award, its impact, its affordability and openness, and its validation level.
trans-unit.target: The Access IT @web2.0 Award is in recognition of a project, product or service that advances accessibility on web 2.0. Endorsed by the International Webmasters Association (IWA). The selection process assesses the relevance for the award, its impact, its affordability and openness, and its validation level.

trans-unit.source: Nominated in the 2010 Best of the Web Awards
trans-unit.target: Nominated in the 2010 Best of the Web Awards

trans-unit.source: Accessible Twitter was a nominee for "Best API Use" in the 2010 .net Magazine's Best of the Web awards.
trans-unit.target: Accessible Twitter was a nominee for "Best API Use" in the 2010 .net Magazine's Best of the Web awards.

trans-unit.source: Nominated in the Blind Bargains: 2009 & 2010 Access Awards
trans-unit.target: Nominated in the Blind Bargains: 2009 & 2010 Access Awards

trans-unit.source: Accessible Twitter was a nominee for "Best Blindness-related Website" in the Blind Bargains: 2009 Access Awards and the Blind Bargains: 2010 Access Awards (category 7).
trans-unit.target: Accessible Twitter was a nominee for "Best Blindness-related Website" in the Blind Bargains: 2009 Access Awards and the Blind Bargains: 2010 Access Awards (category 7).

trans-unit.source: Easy Chirp was the RNIB Featured Website, December 2011.
trans-unit.target: Easy Chirp was the RNIB Featured Website, December 2011.

trans-unit.source: Dennis Lembree is the owner and original developer of Easy Chirp/Accessible Twitter. Easy Chirp 2 is developed by Dennis, Andrew Woods, and Dirk Ginader.
trans-unit.target: Dennis Lembree is the owner and original developer of Easy Chirp/Accessible Twitter. Easy Chirp 2 is developed by Dennis, Andrew Woods, and Dirk Ginader.

trans-unit.source: For more information, visit the Features and Articles & Feedback pages.
trans-unit.target: For more information, visit the Features and Articles & Feedback pages.

trans-unit.source: A successful Kickstarter campaign was run in order to help funding for the relaunch.
trans-unit.target: A successful Kickstarter campaign was run in order to help funding for the relaunch.

trans-unit.source: Big thank-you to the platinum Kickstarter backers:
trans-unit.target: Big thank-you to the platinum Kickstarter backers:

trans-unit.source: Sharron Rush, George Zamfir, John F Croston III, Pratik Patel, Frank M. Palinkas, Mike Paciello.
trans-unit.target: Sharron Rush, George Zamfir, John F Croston III, Pratik Patel, Frank M. Palinkas, Mike Paciello.

trans-unit.source: containing both "twitter" and "search" this is the default operator
trans-unit.target: containing both "twitter" and "search" this is the default operator
